attributes.action: stem cell donation umbilical cord & blood for every hospital
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is to get every hospital round the country so pregnant women can donate there baby's umbilical cord to the nhs blood bank and the stem cells to vital pioneering lifesaving research  at the moment there is only 8 hospitals around the country

• Birmingham Women’s Hospital • Saint Mary's, Manchester • King’s College Hospital in London • Leicester Royal Infirmary • Leicester General Hospital • Nottingham City Hospital • Queen's Medical Centre in Nottingham • The Royal Free Hospital in London -
that you can donate to but you have to have you baby at these hospitals this petition is so every hospital will have this facility and help save thousands of lives from cancer ,Parkinson's and a lot of diseases please sigh and lets get this changed think you
